visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly metric values with mid-year data discontinuity using Highcharts' broken-axis module and custom break line styling

title.text: Annual Sales Distribution with Seasonal Break

events.afterBreaks: function(){/* Original break line rendering logic */}

visualization_explanation: The dataset represents a univariate time series with 12 monthly observations (nominal temporal x-axis, interval ratio y-axis). Synthetic data preserves domain consistency through seasonal patterns (Q2-Q3 peak at 216.4k$) and realistic financial ranges (μ=125.13k$, σ=63.54k$). The broken-axis implementation (Jun-Aug omission) reduces visual clutter while maintaining trend continuity. The spline chart maximizes data-ink ratio per Tufte by eliminating redundant gridlines, while Cairo's salience principle is applied through red break lines (RGB(255,0,0)) to signal data discontinuity. Annotated markers emphasize critical points (Sep peak at +48.6% monthly change) using D3-style percentage formatting.
